title: Colleges of Business Part 2
teaser: University Beat wraps up a two-part look at the changes to USF’s Colleges of Business by heading over to St. Petersburg. Not only does the school there have a new name thanks to a record-setting $10 million dollar donation, but they’ve also broken ground on a new building that finally puts business students and faculty under one roof. We’ll tell you more on this week’s University Beat on WUSF 89.7.
